thread.section_title: Travelopod Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Travelopod | travelopod.com
thread.title: VIKRAM Udeshi

author: VIKRAM Udeshi
title: VIKRAM Udeshi
text:
Shasha Jones was an extremely polite, knowlegeable counselor who helped me procure a ticket to India at short notice which I required on an urgent basis due to a death in the family. She was not only a pleasure to work with but also very efficient in her endeavors and knowledge about pricing and getting great rates. This is the first experience using Travelopod and my interactions were great and I would unhesitatingly endorse their professionalism and efficiency to anyone. Please use this site for all travel related matters.
Thanks a lot Shasha!! You are a star!
Vikram Udeshi
